author: nothappygooutside
comment: if you did use generative AI and you didn't declare, you might be flagged for plagiarism. You should clarify with your tutor asap

author: nothappygooutside
comment: check the assessment rubrics/instructions, is the AI declaration compulsory to submit? if you didn't submit along with your assignment it can still lead to marks lost under organisation. i think you should clarify with your tutor
